articles.title: Queen song featuring Freddie Mercury vocals called Face it Alone is released after 34 years - Daily Mail
articles.description: The track Face It Alone was recorded by Queen lead singer Freddie Mercury in 1988 as the band worked on their album The Miracle but it was left on the cutting room floor.
articles.content:
Queen fans can listen to a new song featuring singer Freddie Mercury after a 'lost' recording from 34 years ago was unearthed
